VEC.Q: How many slices are there in this pie chart?
VEC.A: There are {5} slices in this pie chart.

SRP.Q: In the pie chart, what is the next slice in the clockwise direction from slice Cotton?
SRP.A: The next slice clockwise from slice Cotton is {Rice}.

SRP.Q: In the pie chart, what is the next slice in the counterclockwise direction from slice Cotton?
SRP.A: The next slice counterclockwise from slice Cotton is {Soybeans}.

VPR.Q: Which crop has the largest proportion in this pie chart?
VPR.A: The crop with the largest proportion is {Barley}.

VPR.Q: Which crop has the smallest proportion in this pie chart?
VPR.A: The crop with the smallest proportion is {Rice}.

VE.A: The value of the Cotton slice is {22}%.

SC.Q: What is the difference between the values of Corn and Rice in this pie chart?
SC.A: The difference between Corn and Rice is {2}%.

SC.Q: What is the sum of the values of Soybeans and Barley in this pie chart?
SC.A: The sum of Soybeans and Barley is {50}%.
